start_boss.text: The bigger they are, the harder they fall!
It's David and Goliath, all over again.
This'll be exciting. Get the bombers ready.

retreat.text: Have the fleet cover our retreat!
Put some distance between us and them.

need_help.text: Recall the fighters, we need cover!
Get me the $playerHonorific! I want that escort!
Flight lead! Pull back and cover us!

hull_90.text: Damage control teams are at work.

hull_50.text: Gravity just went out in engineering!

hull_30.text: Redirect the flight crews to damage control!
We're leaking atmosphere! DamCon can't seal the breaches!

overload.text: Reactor overload! Engineering, get to it!
It's starting to get hot in here!

victory.text: Recall the fighter wings. We're done here.
That's what I call a good mission.
Think we got any new aces?

victory_boss.text: Get me the lead of that flight. They're due for a promotion.
Authorize shore leave for the pilots, they've earned it.
